ygData.subject: Re: What i have to put up with
ygData.msgSnippet: The shaman is a good class, however you must know that they have a shorter amount of Mana than you.  You can also ROOT them down and cast on them. When at 16
ygData.messageBody:
The shaman is a good class, however you must know that they have a shorter
amount of Mana than you. You can also ROOT them down and cast on them.
When at 16 level you can buy Shieldskin which will nullify 100HP damage
melee to you. This is very effective. Also you are hitting as hard as him
and you are 2 levels lower. Yes you are more powerful. WHen you reach his
level or 16th you will do more dmg than he.

-----Original Message-----
From: shypht [mailto:evanschu@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 02, 1999 4:17 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: What i have to put up with


From: "shypht" <evanschu@...>

Everyone likes to think thier class is the best class. But the lvl 12 spell
is shock of ligthing no? That max's out at around 83 pnts fo dmg I think,
starts at 77. So you are doing 77 dmg at 12 where is only doing that much at
14. When you hit lvl 16 you get a nice 102 dmg spell, and that is currently
doing 110 dmg for me at lvl 20. But, your lvl 20 DD spell SUCKS. It does 177
dmg, 2% LESS mana efficent then your lvl 16 one, but it does have a 2 second
stun, but it RESISTS WAY TO OFTEN.

But anyways, at the low lvls (yes, lvl 12 is a low lvl, hell 16 is even low
lvl IMO), your DD is very comparable to that of which other class's can do.
But in the end we do dish out much more damage. Can you say "1100dmg in 1
shot" .. can anyone else lay claim to that? not even druids can, their max
damage is 650 I think.
-----Original Message-----
From: Kastor <atlass@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, May 02, 1999 1:10 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] What i have to put up with


>From: "Kastor" <atlass@...>
>
>Sorry this is so long.
>
>
>I'm a level 11 wizard about to turn 12. Well my friend is a shaman who
just
>turned 14. Well he just brought
>his new damage spell and he said it does 77 damage, to which i replied kewl
>my next spell does that amount
>too. That was a mistake he started laughing and saying things like "why
>would anyone want to play the wizard
>when they can play the shaman". "the shaman can stand toe to toe like the
>warrior and do the same damage
>as the wizard, Ha HA HA HA ....." . Then he went on saying crap like now he
>knows the shaman is the best
>class in the game. All he could talk about before was the sow spell, and
now
>it is he does the same damage
>as the wizard. My question is this, i thought i picked the wizard so i
>would not have to hear stuff like this?
>I thought level 12 was when the wizard started to leave other mage class
>behind. Know i have to hear alot
>aggraviating crap from this shaman, laughing at the wizard class. Dam that
>is going to suck. Someone
>please tell me there is hope out there as far as the damage spells go.
>
>
